mapper.sql: id, code, name, image, weight, sex, age, description, price, quantity, categoryCode, createTime, status
mapper.update:
UPDATE pet_pet
code = #{map.code},
name = #{map.name},
image = #{map.image},
weight = #{map.weight},
sex = #{map.sex},
age = #{map.age},
description = #{map.description},
price = #{map.price},
quantity = #{map.quantity},
categoryCode = #{map.categoryCode},
createTime = #{map.createTime},
status = #{map.status},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
